name: PentairHome
0:
”Alexa open Pentair Home”
”Alexa begin Pentair Home”
”Alexa launch Pentair Home”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pentair home
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Pentair Home skill (beta) for Amazon Alexa will allow you to monitor and remotely control your connected Pentair water devices, anytime, from anywhere. 

Currently, the products compatible with this skill are:
 • Pentair’s IntelliConnect Pool Automation device with relay-connected lights. 
 • Pentair’s Color Sync™ Controller for Pentair Color LED Pool Lights.
 • Pentair ChemCheck® Water Quality Monitoring System
 
To get started, sign in to the Pentair Home App and add a compatible device to your account. Enable this skill in the Alexa App and then link the skill to your Pentair Home App using your Pentair Home credentials.
IntelliConnect Available Commands:
“Alexa, tell Pentair Home to turn on/off my pool light(s).”
“Alexa, tell Pentair Home to turn my pool light(s) to blue.”
“Alexa, tell Pentair Home to turn my pool light to Sunset.”
“Alexa, tell Pentair Home to turn my pool light to Party Mode.”

Color Sync Available Commands:
“Alexa, tell Pentair Home to turn on/off my pool light(s).”
“Alexa, tell Pentair Home to turn my pool light(s) on for 2 hours.”
“Alexa, tell Pentair Home to turn my pool light(s) on from 5 PM to 8 PM.”
“Alexa, tell Pentair Home to schedule my pool light(s) on weekdays from 5 PM to 8 PM.”
“Alexa, tell Pentair Home to turn my pool light(s) to blue.”
“Alexa, tell Pentair Home to turn my pool light to Sunset.”
“Alexa, tell Pentair Home to turn my pool light to Party Mode for 1 hour.”

ChemCheck Available Commands:
You can access any information related to your Pentair ChemCheck device, including pH, ORP, and manual test results you’ve recently added such as cyanuric acid, calcium hardness, total alkalinity, total chlorine, and free chlorine. Some examples to get you started are:
”Alexa, ask Pentair Home: What are my ChemCheck readings?”
”Alexa, ask Pentair Home: Is my pool water is balanced.”
”Alexa, ask Pentair Home: What is my pool’s pH?”
”Alexa, ask Pentair Home: What is my pool’s ORP?”
”Alexa, ask Pentair Home: What is my pool water temperature?”
”Alexa, ask Pentair Home: What are my last manual test results?”
”Alexa, ask Pentair Home: What is the correct pH for pool water?”
”Alexa, ask Pentair Home: What is the correct range for total chlorine?”

This skill is currently in beta. For troubleshooting or feedback, please contact us online:
https://www.pentair.com/en-us/education-support/contact-us/pool-spa-equipment-customer-service.html
